page.title: 08Pestalozzi in Sedlescombe
page.content:
A unique feature of Sedlescombe is the Pestalozzi Children's Village situated within the Parish. This is a branch of the original home in Switzerland started by Pestalozzi after the Second World War.
Within its village there is an old manor house, and modern buildings each designed to hold a different nationality. Children come from as far away as Vietnam and Tibet and are educated in local Secondary Schools but preserve their own cultures and religions within their respective homes.
